sentences.english: The best reading method of writings in classical chmese was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了文言文的最佳阅读方法。

sentences.english: Imperative usage and conative usage are the common expression in ancient Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 使动用法和意动法是文言文常用的两种表达方式。

sentences.english: The second chapter analyzes the status of teaching classical Chinese language Sujiao Ban High School.
sentences.chinese: 第二章分析了苏教版高中语文文言文教学现状。

sentences.english: It is a requirement that the senior middle school should have the ability to read some easy writings of Classical Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 具备浅易文言文的阅读能力是对高中生的一个要求。

sentences.english: Classical Chinese is too simple, used brush answer, it is cheaper them.
sentences.chinese: 文言文太简单，全用毛笔答题，这是便宜他们。

sentences.english: Thus to strengthen the classical teaching in Senior High is in the process.
sentences.chinese: 那么高中文言文教学之新面目定能指日可待。

sentences.english: As for Chinese, we read more writings in the literary style than before.
sentences.chinese: 关于中文，我们现在比从前读更多的文言文。

sentences.english: This book is written in classical Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 这本著作是用文言文写成的。

sentences.english: I'll talk about training methods using the non-intelligence factor in five ways.
sentences.chinese: 三是文言文教学中培养非智力因素的途径和方法。

sentences.english: We gotta(have got to) review these ancient articles we have learnt.
sentences.chinese: 我们要把学过的文言文内容双习好。

sentences.english: Content: This paper based on the new curriculum reform against the backdrop of classical Chinese Senior Teaching.
sentences.chinese: 本文立足于新课改背景下高中文言文的教学探索。

definition: old language/the Classics/Classical Chinese as a literary model, esp. in Tang and Song prose/Classical Chinese as a school subject
literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty
eight-part essay one had to master to pass the imperial exams in Ming and Qing dynasties
The Analects of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
